title: Amos Lee - Arms of a Woman (live #MicroShow performance for The Current)
description:
Singer-songwriter Amos Lee joins The Current for a #MicroShow at the Hook & Ladder Theatre in Minneapolis. Lee performs "Arms of a Woman" from his 2005 album "Amos Lee".

Watch Amos Lee's full #MicroShow, including performances of songs from his 2022 record "Dreamland": https://youtu.be/9DnGE2Ixovc

title: Amos Lee - Worry No More (live #MicroShow performance for The Current)
description:
Singer-songwriter Amos Lee joins The Current for a #MicroShow at the Hook & Ladder Theatre in Minneapolis. Lee performs the title track from his 2022 album "Worry No More".

Watch the full #MicroShow, including performances of songs from across Amos Lee's catalog: https://youtu.be/9DnGE2Ixovc

title: Amos Lee - live performance for The Current's #MicroShow
description:
Amos Lee performs music from across his catalog, including a few tracks from his 2022 record "Dreamland" at the Hook & Ladder Theatre in Minneapolis for a #MicroShow with The Current. 

Songs Played
00:01 Violin
04:36 Keep It Loose, Keep It Tight
09:30 Worry No More
12:40 See The Light
17:08 Madison
21:15 Sweet Pea
23:50 Windows Are Rolled Down

title: Delta Spirit - three song performances for The Current (2020)
description:
In October 2020, Delta Spirit gathered in a studio in Nashville to record performances of three songs from "What Is There," their album from that year. Watch those performances, recorded exclusively for The Current.

SONGS PERFORMED
0:00 "It Ain't Easy"
3:23 "Home Again"
6:24 "The Pressure"

PERSONNEL
Brandon Young – drums
Matthew Vasquez – vocals, guitar
Kelly Winrich – keys
William McLaren – guitar
Note: bassist Jonathan Jameson was unable to attend this session due to travel restrictions

FIND MORE:
2012 studio session: https://www.thecurrent.org/feature/2012/06/28/delta-spirit-2012
2014 studio session: https://www.thecurrent.org/feature/2014/10/16/delta-spirit-perform-in-the-current-studio
2014 Guitar Collection interview with Matt Vasquez:
https://www.thecurrent.org/feature/2014/11/05/the-current-s-guitar-collection-matt-vasquez-of-delta-spirit
